prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with large horns and a tough exoskeleton.
I want a Pokemon that can fly and has bright yellow wings.
Generate a creature that resembles an insect, with powerful pincers and a sturdy body.
Make an intimidating Pokemon with a mix of brown and yellow colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a strong, aggressive personality.
Design a Pokemon that is both a fighter and a bug type, showcasing its battle skills.
Give me a unique Pokemon with a focus on strength and agility in combat.
